full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 213 of 261 1374 LC6VMAX6 Maguire - direct MS. MOE: Ms. Drescher, could you just highlight that and blow that up. Thank you. If we could take that down, but then blow up -- apologies. Would you mind just dropping the call out. Q. Special Agent Maguire, do you see a stereo system in this photograph? A. Yes, I do. Q. Was there a stereo system in the massage room? A. Yes, ma'am, there was. MS. MOE: Ms. Drescher, could you please highlight that for the jury. Thank you. We can take that down. Q. I want to turn now and ask you about some other areas of the residence. Did there come a time when you obtained legal authority to search the residence for things like CDs? A. Yes, ma'am. Q. I want to ask you a little bit about that. MS. MOE: If we could please show the witness what's been marked for identification as Government Exhibit 914; and just to the witness, counsel, and the Court. Q. Special Agent Maguire, do you recognize this? A. Yes, ma'am, I do. Q. What are we looking at in Government Exhibit 914? A. This is a photograph that was taken in a closet located on SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018550
